item.description:
We will finish Spinoza's Ethics with Part IV and Part V. It is pp 103 through 162 in: The Essential Spinoza - Ethics and Related Writings Edited by Michael L. Morgan Translated by Samuel Shirley (ISBN: 0-87220-803-6).
(Thai Cuisine is opposite side of the street to Bombay Club. It is a new place for us, again if you do not find us there by 7:15 then we are in the Bombay Club.)

Advanced notice:
After the next meeting we plan to continue with Hobbes' Leviathan. Possible editions of the book may vary in keeping the old Elizabethan English or having modern spelling. One edition by Penguin Classics (ISBN: 0-140-43195-0) keeps the old spelling. Please let us know the ISBN number if you are aware of an edition with modern English spelling.
item.name: Baruch Spinoza: Ethics IV
